description:
As Seiya, Shun and Shiryu escape their crashed plane, the Silver Saint Algol appears before them. His Medusa Shield turns Seiya and Shun to stone.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Seiya Turned to Stone! The Medusa Shield
Seiya ga Ishi ni! Medusa no Tate
¡Seiya se convierte en piedra! El escudo de la Medusa
星矢が石に! メドウサの盾
